channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Family 2011 The villain Gargamel succeeds in expelling the Smurfs from their village to New York City through a magical portal. Now, they must find a way back before he destroys them. Neil Patrick Harris, Jayma Mays, Hank Azaria, Katy Perry, Jonathan Winters, Raja Gosnell, J. David Stem, David N. Weiss, Alan Cumming, Fred Armisen.
